name: Vanished (Games Development - IADE-UE)
description:
3D CROSS Project developed by 2nd year students of the Games Development and Global Design courses (2020/2021). 

Programmers:

  • David Costa
  • Telmo Francisco

Artists:

  • Aurora Silva
  • Bernardo Gomes
  • Catarina Cruz
  • Ema Parreira
  • Jessica Sutton

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Walk 
  • Q - Open Inventory
  • F - Interaction
  • X - Turn on/off flashlight
  • Z - Remove item equipped from hand
  • Space - Deer struggle / Jump
  • Mouse movement - Look around
  • Mouse left click - Use functionalities of the item you are holding
  • Mouse right click - Camera zoom
  • Esc - Pause the game

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
